response.overview: You hold in your hand one of the most thought provoking and informative videos you may ever view.  The thread of occultism is woven through nations and world leaders. Since the time of Nimrod at the ancient city of Babel, to the present days of Saddam Hussein, the "ancient occult mysteries" have been practiced.  Hear information concerning the following: •  Hitler's fascination with the "Sword of Destiny" • How Hitler's "occult connection" created the Holocaust • The curse placed on President John Kennedy • How President Reagan broke the "zero curse," and the untold story of his assassination attempt. • How the Nazi and "New Age" agenda is the same • Exposing "channeling" in the New Age movement • The truth behind "New Age" healings • What about psychics and the new 900 numbers Be prepared to hear insight that will help you better understand the operation of Satan's kingdom among world leaders, nations, and in the lives of individuals.
response.tagline: There is an occult connection that runs from Nimrod (Genesis 11) to Saddam Hussein in Iraq!
response.title: The Occult Connection
